scripts.copy: copyfiles -f ../../LICENSE-MIT ../../LICENSE-Apache dist; copyfiles package.dist.json README.md eth-utils/injective-LICENSE dist
scripts.copy-and-rename: npm run copy && npm run rename
scripts.build: npm run clean; tsc; tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json; npm run copy-and-rename
scripts.bp: npm run build && npm run pub
